Properties.ProtectedString: local a=script.Parent;local b={}local c=script.Parent:WaitForChild("creator").Value;local d=5.8;local e=d+30;function checkObject(f)if f~=a and f.className=="Part"then if f.Anchored==false then table.insert(b,f)end elseif f.className=="Model"or f.className=="Hat"or f.className=="Tool"or f==workspace then local g=f:GetChildren()for h=1,#g do checkObject(g[h])end;f.ChildAdded:connect(checkObject)end end;checkObject(workspace)local i=0;while true do if i<#b then i=i+1;if i%80000==0 then wait()end else i=1;wait()end;local g=b[i]if g~=a and g.className=="Part"and g.Anchored==false and g.Parent~=c.Character and game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(g.Parent) and g.Parent:findFirstChild("ForceField") == nil then local j=a.Position-g.Position;local k=g:FindFirstChild("BlackHole Influence")if j.magnitude*d<e then g:BreakJoints()if j.magnitude*d<e and g.Size.z+a.Size.x>j.magnitude*2-4 then e=e+g:GetMass()g:Remove()table.remove(b,i)i=i-1 else g.CanCollide=false;if k==nil then k=Instance.new("BodyPosition")k.Parent=g;k.Name="BlackHole Influence"end;k.position=a.Position;k.maxForce=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*e*g:GetMass()/j.magnitude*d end elseif k~=nil then k:Remove()end end end
